code: import{swap}from"../Algorithms/swap";export function getSelectionSortAnimation(array){var animations=[];if(array.length<=1)return array;var auxiliaryArray=array.slice();selectionSort(animations,auxiliaryArray);return animations;}function selectionSort(animations,items){var len=items.length;var indexOfMin;for(var i=0;i<len;i++){indexOfMin=i;for(var j=i+1;j<len;j++){if(items[j]<items[indexOfMin]){indexOfMin=j;}}animations.push([-1,indexOfMin]);swap(items,i,indexOfMin);for(var _j=i;_j<indexOfMin+1;_j++){animations.push([-2,_j]);}animations.push([i,indexOfMin]);}return items;}
